Built : Very well built. U can always trust Motorola for its strong hardware (just like Nokia). It fall down twice or maybe thrice but this Corning Gorilla 3 with Scratch proof Glass is superb nothing happened not even a scratch. Conclusion : For normal mobile usage (girls and elders) G2 is the best smartphone in this price range, but if u are an avid user (tech savvy guys like me) then better go for Moto G 3rd Gen.
